notes: Conditional logic via Python control flow

pipeline_summary.name: global_dag
pipeline_summary.description: Comprehensive ETL pipeline processing French government death records and power plant data through staged ETL pattern with mixed topology

components.name: Extract City Geo Data
components.description: Downloads city geographic coordinates mapping data from a static CSV endpoint.

upstream_policy.description: Runs after all prerequisite data sources are successfully extracted

components.name: Extract Nuclear Plant Data
components.description: Fetches nuclear power plant metadata and extracts CSV data from data.gouv.fr API.

upstream_policy.description: Runs after all prerequisite data sources are successfully extracted

components.name: Extract Thermal Plant Data
components.description: Fetches thermal power plant metadata and extracts CSV data from data.gouv.fr API.

upstream_policy.description: Runs after all prerequisite data sources are successfully extracted

components.name: Extract Death Records
components.description: Fetches death record metadata and downloads multiple death data files from data.gouv.fr API.

upstream_policy.description: Runs after all prerequisite data sources are successfully extracted

components.name: Create Database Tables
components.description: Creates target database tables in PostgreSQL using SQL schema files.

upstream_policy.description: Runs after all prerequisite data sources are successfully extracted

components.name: Load Death Data to Redis
components.description: Loads death records from ingestion files into Redis with deduplication.

upstream_policy.description: Runs after death records are extracted

components.name: Cleanse Death Data
components.description: Transforms death records with geographic mapping and date formatting.

upstream_policy.description: Runs after death data is loaded to Redis

components.name: Cleanse Power Plant Data
components.description: Cleans and transforms power plant data with column standardization.

upstream_policy.description: Runs after power plant data is extracted

components.name: Generate Power Plant SQL
components.description: Generates SQL insertion queries for power plant data with deduplication.

upstream_policy.description: Runs after power plant data is cleansed

components.name: Check Death Data Emptiness
components.description: Checks if death data processing produced valid SQL queries for conditional branching.

components.name: Load Death Data to Postgres
components.description: Executes death data insertion into PostgreSQL when data exists.

upstream_policy.description: Runs conditionally when death data exists

components.name: Load Power Plant Data to Postgres
components.description: Loads power plant data into PostgreSQL using generated SQL queries.

upstream_policy.description: Runs after power plant SQL queries are generated

components.name: Cleanup Temp Death Files
components.description: Cleans up temporary death data from Redis and file system.

upstream_policy.description: Runs after death data processing is complete

description.default: Comprehensive ETL pipeline processing French government death records and power plant data through staged ETL pattern with mixed topology

batch_window.description: Batch window parameter name (e.g., ds, execution_date)

partitioning.description: Data partitioning strategy (e.g., daily, hourly, monthly)

depends_on_past.description: Whether execution depends on previous run success

city_geo_dataset_url.description: URL for city geographic coordinates mapping data
city_geo_dataset_url.constraints: Must be a valid URL to static.data.gouv.fr CSV endpoint

output_file_path.description: Path to save the city geo location CSV file
output_file_path.constraints: Must be a valid file path

nuclear_dataset_id.description: Dataset ID for nuclear power plant data API
nuclear_dataset_id.constraints: Must be a valid dataset ID from data.gouv.fr

output_json_path.description: Path to save nuclear plants metadata JSON file
output_json_path.constraints: Must be a valid file path

output_csv_path.description: Path to save nuclear plants CSV data
output_csv_path.constraints: Must be a valid file path

thermal_dataset_id.description: Dataset ID for thermal power plant data API
thermal_dataset_id.constraints: Must be a valid dataset ID from data.gouv.fr

output_json_path.description: Path to save thermal plants metadata JSON file
output_json_path.constraints: Must be a valid file path

output_csv_path.description: Path to save thermal plants CSV data
output_csv_path.constraints: Must be a valid file path

death_dataset_id.description: Dataset ID for death records data API
death_dataset_id.constraints: Must be a valid dataset ID from data.gouv.fr

output_json_path.description: Path to save death resources metadata JSON file
output_json_path.constraints: Must be a valid file path

max_resource.description: Maximum number of death data resources to download

death_table_schema_path.description: Path to SQL schema file for death records table
death_table_schema_path.constraints: Must be a valid file path to SQL file

power_plant_table_schema_path.description: Path to SQL schema file for power plants table
power_plant_table_schema_path.constraints: Must be a valid file path to SQL file

redis_host.constraints: Must be a valid hostname or IP address

redis_port.constraints: Must be a valid port number (1-65535)

death_files_directory.constraints: Must be a valid directory path

death_raw_redis_key.description: Redis key for raw death data list
death_raw_redis_key.constraints: Must be a valid Redis key name

imported_files_redis_key.description: Redis key for tracking imported death files
imported_files_redis_key.constraints: Must be a valid Redis key name

city_geo_file_path.description: Path to city geographic coordinates CSV file
city_geo_file_path.constraints: Must be a valid file path

death_raw_redis_key.description: Redis key for raw death data list
death_raw_redis_key.constraints: Must be a valid Redis key name

output_sql_path.description: Path to output SQL insertion queries file
output_sql_path.constraints: Must be a valid file path

thermal_csv_path.description: Path to raw thermal plants CSV data
thermal_csv_path.constraints: Must be a valid file path

nuclear_csv_path.description: Path to raw nuclear plants CSV data
nuclear_csv_path.constraints: Must be a valid file path

output_thermal_csv_path.description: Path to cleaned thermal plants CSV output
output_thermal_csv_path.constraints: Must be a valid file path

output_nuclear_csv_path.description: Path to cleaned nuclear plants CSV output
output_nuclear_csv_path.constraints: Must be a valid file path

cleaned_thermal_csv_path.description: Path to cleaned thermal plants CSV data
cleaned_thermal_csv_path.constraints: Must be a valid file path

cleaned_nuclear_csv_path.description: Path to cleaned nuclear plants CSV data
cleaned_nuclear_csv_path.constraints: Must be a valid file path

output_sql_path.description: Path to output SQL insertion queries file
output_sql_path.constraints: Must be a valid file path

death_insertion_queries_path.description: Path to death data SQL insertion queries file
death_insertion_queries_path.constraints: Must be a valid file path

death_insertion_queries_path.description: Path to death data SQL insertion queries file
death_insertion_queries_path.constraints: Must be a valid file path

plant_insertion_queries_path.description: Path to power plant SQL insertion queries file
plant_insertion_queries_path.constraints: Must be a valid file path

redis_host.constraints: Must be a valid hostname or IP address

redis_port.constraints: Must be a valid port number (1-65535)

death_raw_redis_key.description: Redis key for raw death data list
death_raw_redis_key.constraints: Must be a valid Redis key name

temp_sql_files_directory.description: Directory containing temporary SQL query files
temp_sql_files_directory.constraints: Must be a valid directory path

INGESTION_DATA_DIR.description: Directory for storing ingested data files

STAGING_DATA_DIR.description: Directory for storing staged data files

SQL_QUERIES_DIR.description: Directory for storing SQL query files

sources: data.gouv.fr API endpoints for French government datasets
static.data.gouv.fr CSV endpoint for city geographic coordinates
Local filesystem containing raw data files
sinks: Local filesystem with cleaned CSV files and SQL queries
